title: Betcoin.AG
author: Betcoin.AG
content: $2,500 Leaderboard Mania Starts MondayLeaderboard Mania has returned to Betcoin, and we are bringing all 5 leaderboards back for players to the compete for the top spots.$500 in bitcoin for each LeaderboardRace to the TopMost Bets CasinoMost Bets SportsHighest ROI CasinoHighest ROI SportsThe competition will run from February 27, 2023 - March 6, 2023 and $2,500 is up for grabs in the guaranteed prize pool.The payout for each competition will be paid to the top 5 players as follows:1st $200 2nd $125 3rd $100 4th $50 5th $25Additionally, players 6-10 will receive 5 free spins in the casino.Promotion starts Monday, 27 February 2023.
